question1.text: I lay down to sleep, but I got a message from my friend on KakaoTalk.

answers.A: I need to answer them now!!!
answers.B: Oh well, I have tomorrow. I can answer them tomorrow.

question6.text: My plan just got cancelled. I have nothing to do now

answers.A: For this moment, I have my todo list.
Okay. I am going to wear this tomorrow. I will remind them the location and time too.
answers.B: I am so excited! It will be fun when we hang around.

question3.text: My friend baked me cookies. However, the cookies are... tasteless.

answers.A: I will smile and eat no matter what.
answers.B: I will tell my friend that they are literally tasteless.

question4.text: I found a mistake someone made.

answers.A: If it's minor, I don't need to correct it. For the last resort, I can fix it.
answers.B: I tell or help them to resolve the problem.

question5.text: I see my friend is having a hard time.

answers.A: I will wait for them to open up to me. Meanwhile, I will support them emotionally.
answers.B: I will ask them what's wrong and try to help them.

question2.text: I am having fun with my friends, but someone said they are going home.

answers.A: What? But we are having fun? I don't want to be alone. This is sad.
answers.B: Finally! This is the only chance. I will join them so I can go home and rest.

answers.A: I should talk. We will be friends!
answers.B: I will wait for the right moment. I don't want to be awkward.

question9.text: My friend has invited me to a party.

answers.A: Yay. Party time. I will definitely go.
answers.B: Oh thank you. How do I refuse this...?

question10.text: Someone asked me a philosophical question.

answers.A: Oh I have been thinking of that all the time. Here is what I think.

question11.text: I am at a restaurant. I am going to order a dish.

answers.A: I will order the same dish I always order.
answers.B: I will order something new. I want to try something new.

question12.text: You are gazing at the ocean.

answers.A: This is beutiful. I want to take a picture.
answers.B: Who are we? Where are we? What is the meaning of life?
